tool_description: An API which Pulls US Covid-19 data directly from The New York Times.
name: Covid-19 Data NYT
title: Covid-19 Data NYT

api_list.name: Get Specific State Data By Date
api_list.description:
Get the amount of new covid-19 cases and deaths on a specified date in a specified state.

States must be specified by their Two-Letter State Abbreviations: https://www.ssa.gov/international/coc-docs/states.html
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com/specific/2021-01-20/ny"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com/specific/{yyyy_mm_dd}/{stateabbrev}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific US Data By Date
api_list.description: Get the amount of new covid-19 cases and deaths in the US on a specified date.
api_list.code:

url = "https://covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com/specific/2021-01-20"

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Total State Data By Date
api_list.description:
Get the total amount of covid-19 cases and deaths in a specified state from 2020-01-21 up to a specified date (if the data is available).

States must be specified by their Two-Letter State Abbreviations: https://www.ssa.gov/international/coc-docs/states.html
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com/total/2021-01-20/ny"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-data-nyt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
